act.title: Sri Jayewardenepura General Hospital Board Act

statutoryBodies.name: Sri Jayewardenepura General Hospital Board
statutoryBodies.statusNote: Established by Section 2 as a body corporate with perpetual succession and a common seal. Manages and administers the Sri Jayewardenepura General Hospital. 11 members: 8 appointed by the Minister and 3 ex-officio. Quorum is 5 members. Board meets at least once per month. Chairman appointed by the Minister (S.3(1)(a)).

exOfficio.role: Director of Post Graduate Institute of Medicine (or nominee)

appointed.note: Nominated by the Secretary to the Ministry of Health (S.3(1)(b))
Nominated by the Secretary to the Ministry of Finance (S.3(1)(c))

appointed.role: Members from consultancy staff elected by medical/dental staff
appointed.note: Elected by medical and dental staff of the Hospital (S.3(1)(d))

composition.termLength: 3 years (appointed members); ex-officio serve while holding posts

meetings.chairperson: Chairman appointed by Minister (S.3(1)(a)); if absent, members elect one among themselves to preside (S.5(2))
meetings.reporting: Annual audit under Article 154 of the Constitution (S.12)

powers: Receive grants, subsidies, donations, gifts, and bequests (S.7(a))
Hold, purchase, take on lease, or otherwise acquire movable and immovable property (S.7(b))
Sell, mortgage, lease, exchange, or otherwise dispose of any property (S.7(c))
Appoint, dismiss, and exercise disciplinary control over employees (S.7(d))
Administer the Fund established under S.10 (S.7(e))
Open and maintain bank accounts as approved by the Minister (S.7(f))
Borrow money with the Minister's approval (S.7(g))
Do all things necessary or expedient for the proper management and administration of the Hospital (S.7(i))
dataGaps: Current membership of the Board not publicly documented
No publicly available meeting records or minutes
Whether the Board has held regular monthly meetings is unknown
Annual audit reports under S.12 not publicly compiled
Regulations made under S.11 not publicly accessible
Current financial status of the Fund (S.10) not publicly documented
Whether the Board exercises all statutory powers or delegates to Committee of Management is unknown

statutoryBodies.name: Committee of Management
statutoryBodies.statusNote: Established by Section 8 for the day-to-day administration of the Hospital. 7 members chaired by the Director of the Hospital. The Board Chairman may attend meetings. Committee sets its own quorum and procedure. Exercises powers delegated by the Board.

exOfficio.role: Hospital Secretary or Chief Administrative Officer

appointed.note: Appointed by the Board from among the consultancy staff (S.8(b)-(d))

composition.termLength: Not specified in Act — Board appointment

meetings.frequency: Not specified — Committee sets own procedure
meetings.quorum: Not specified — Committee sets own quorum (S.8)

powers: Day-to-day administration of the Hospital as delegated by the Board (S.8)
dataGaps: Current membership of the Committee not publicly documented
Whether the Committee meets regularly is unknown
Scope of delegated powers from the Board is unknown
Committee's own procedural rules not publicly accessible
Relationship between Committee decisions and Board oversight is unclear

timeline.event: Sri Jayewardenepura General Hospital Board Act enacted
timeline.details: Enacted as Act No. 54 of 1983, certified 29 December 1983. Establishes the Sri Jayewardenepura General Hospital Board as a body corporate with perpetual succession. 19 sections (no Parts). Creates an 11-member Board (8 appointed + 3 ex-officio), a 7-member Committee of Management, and a dedicated Fund for hospital finances.
The Sri Jayewardenepura General Hospital commenced operations on 17 September 1984 as a tertiary care facility under the management of the Board established by the Act.

tiers.name: Minister
tiers.relationship: Policy authority: appoints Board Chairman and 2 distinguished members (S.3(1)(a),(e)), determines remuneration (S.4), gives general directions on Board policy (S.9), approves bank accounts and borrowing (S.7(f),(g)), makes regulations (S.11)

tiers.name: Sri Jayewardenepura General Hospital Board
tiers.relationship: Body corporate (S.2): 11 members (8 appointed + 3 ex-officio); manages hospital, administers Fund, holds property, appoints staff; meets at least monthly with quorum of 5 (S.5(1)); subject to Minister's general directions (S.9)

tiers.name: Committee of Management
tiers.relationship: Subordinate body (S.8): 7 members chaired by Director of the Hospital; handles day-to-day administration as delegated by Board; Board Chairman may attend meetings; sets own quorum and procedure

tiers.name: Hospital Staff
tiers.relationship: Public officers (S.14): Board may appoint staff (S.7(d)); public officers may be transferred/seconded with consent of relevant authority; staff deemed to be public officers for purposes of the Penal Code

currentReplacement.national: Minister of Health exercises policy authority over the Board; Board operates as an autonomous body corporate
currentReplacement.provincial: Not applicable — hospital governance is a national function under this Act
